00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_GADGET_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_GADGET_H
00022 
00023 #include "../preprocess.h"
00024 
00025 template<typename VarArray>
00026 struct GadgetConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00027 {
00028   virtual string constraint_name()
00029   { return "Gadget"; }
00030     
00031   VarArray var_array;
00032   
00033   vector<AnyVarRef> construction_vars;
00034   
00035   shared_ptr<CSPInstance> gadget_instance;
00036   StateObj* gadget_stateObj;
00037   PropagationLevel gadget_prop_type;
00038   
00039   bool constraint_locked;
00040   
00041   GadgetConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _vars, shared_ptr<CSPInstance> _gadget, PropagationLevel _proptype) : 
00042   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_vars), gadget_instance(_gadget),
00043   gadget_stateObj(new StateObj), gadget_prop_type(_proptype), 
00044   constraint_locked(false)
00045   { 
00046     BuildCSP(gadget_stateObj, *gadget_instance); 
00047     construction_vars.reserve(gadget_instance->constructionSite.size());
00048     for(int i = 0; i < gadget_instance->constructionSite.size(); ++i)
00049       construction_vars.push_back(get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(gadget_stateObj, gadget_instance->constructionSite[i]));
00050     if(construction_vars.size() != var_array.size())
00051       INPUT_ERROR("Gadgets construction site is incorrect size");
00052   }
00053   
00054   virtual ~GadgetConstraint()
00055   { delete gadget_stateObj; }
00056   
00057   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00058   {
00059     cerr << "You can't reverse a gadget Constraint!";
00060     FAIL_EXIT();
00061   }
00062   
00063   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00064   {
00065     triggerCollection t;
00066     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00067       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), DomainChanged));
00068     return t;
00069   }
00070   
00071   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00072   { 
00073     cout << "Gadget Assignment:" << v << endl;
00074     return true;
00075   }
00076   
00077   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00078   {
00079     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00080     vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00081     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00082       vars.push_back(var_array[i]);
00083     return vars;
00084   }
00085 
00086   virtual void special_check()
00087   {
00088     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00089     constraint_locked = false;
00090     do_prop();
00091   }
00092   
00093   virtual void special_unlock()
00094   {
00095     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00096     constraint_locked = false;
00097   }
00098   
00099   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta domain)
00100   {
00101     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Gadget);
00102     if(constraint_locked)
00103       return;
00104 
00105     constraint_locked = true;
00106     getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00107   }
00108   
00109   virtual void full_propagate()
00110   {
00111     if(getState(gadget_stateObj).isFailed())
00112     {
00113       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00114       return;
00115     }
00116     do_prop();
00117   }
00118 
00119   void do_prop()
00120   { 
00121     D_ASSERT(!getState(gadget_stateObj).isFailed());
00122     Controller::world_push(gadget_stateObj);
00123     
00124     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00125     {
00126       DomainInt min_val = var_array[i].getMin();
00127       DomainInt max_val = var_array[i].getMax();
00128       construction_vars[i].setMin(min_val);
00129       construction_vars[i].setMax(max_val);
00130       
00131       for(int j = min_val + 1; j < max_val; ++j)
00132         if(!var_array[i].inDomain(j))
00133           construction_vars[i].removeFromDomain(j);
00134     }
00135     
00136     PropogateCSP(gadget_stateObj, gadget_prop_type, construction_vars);
00137 
00138     if(getState(gadget_stateObj).isFailed())
00139     {
00140       getState(gadget_stateObj).setFailed(false);
00141       Controller::world_pop(gadget_stateObj);
00142       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00143       return;
00144     }
00145         
00146     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00147     {
00148       DomainInt min_val = construction_vars[i].getMin();
00149       DomainInt max_val = construction_vars[i].getMax();
00150       var_array[i].setMin(min_val);
00151       var_array[i].setMax(max_val);
00152       
00153       for(int j = min_val + 1; j < max_val; ++j)
00154       {
00155         if(!construction_vars[i].inDomain(j))
00156         { 
00157           var_array[i].removeFromDomain(j);
00158         }
00159       }
00160     }
00161     
00162     Controller::world_pop(gadget_stateObj);
00163   }
00164 };
00165 
00166 template<typename VarArray>
00167 GadgetConstraint<VarArray>*
00168 gadgetCon(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, ConstraintBlob& blob)
00169 { return new GadgetConstraint<VarArray>(stateObj, vars, blob.gadget, blob.gadget_prop_type); }
00170 
00171 #ifdef REENTER
00172 
00173 template<typename Vars>
00174 AbstractConstraint*
00175 BuildCT_GADGET(StateObj* stateObj, const Vars& vars, ConstraintBlob& blob)
00176 { return gadgetCon(stateObj, vars, blob); }
00177 
00178 #else
00179 
00180 template<typename Vars>
00181 AbstractConstraint*
00182 BuildCT_GADGET(StateObj* stateObj, const Vars& vars, ConstraintBlob& blob)
00183 { INPUT_ERROR("This constraint requires REENTER support."); }
00184 #endif
00185 
00186 #endif
